00001 <h2>Traceroute, reinvented</h2>
00002 <p class="centered">
00003         <img id="screenshot" style="margin: 10px"
00004                 src="/assets/images/software/widgets/3diplookup/3diplookup-screenshot-0.1.png" alt="3D IP Lookup Widget" /></p>
00005 <p>
00006         <a href="http://tetra.emeraldion.it/3dip_lookup.html">3D IP Lookup web service</a> is an experimental tool to
00007         generate Google Earth plugins from <code>traceroute</code> outputs.
00008         Have you ever wondered where the heck in the world was the IP Address <tt>158.42.4.23</tt> that you see in your blog statistics?
00009         Yes, there is the <code>traceroute</code> commandline utility, but what do those obscure lines mean?
00010         What if you could visualize the results on that gorgeous Google Earth 3D map?
00011         So I built this service that creates Google Earth Plugins using IP geolocation information from
00012         <a href="http://www.hostip.info/" class="external">My IP Address lookup</a> service.
00013 </p>
00014 <p>
00015         3D IP Lookup widget brings the 3D IP Lookup web service to your Dashboard in a compact, easy to use interface.
00016 </p>
00017 <p>
00018         Minimum system requirements are Mac OS X 10.4 &ldquo;Tiger&rdquo; or later,
00019         <a href="http://earth.google.com" class="external">Google Earth</a>,
00020         an Internet connection (broadband recommended) and a
00021         lot of patience (the <code>traceroute</code> command can take a very long time to run sometimes).
00022 </p>
00023 <p>
00024         3D IP Lookup web service is based on <a href="http://www.hostip.info/" class="external">My IP Address lookup</a>
00025         and is still in early beta phase. Any feedback is highly appreciated.
00026 </p>
00027 <div class="comment-odd">
00028         <h3>Who&rsquo;s using 3D IP Lookup Widget?</h3>
00029         <p>
00030                 Professor Ross Beveridge used 3D IP Lookup Widget to generate a
00031                 <a href="http://www.cs.colostate.edu/~ct310/yr2008/Progress/ProgressMedia/routingMovieMoscow/MoscowUniversityTraceRout.php" class="external">movie of a traceroute flyover from colostate.edu to msu.ru</a>
00032                 for the introductory presentation of his 
00033                 <a href="http://www.cs.colostate.edu/~ct310/" class="external">CT 310 course</a>
00034                 at Colorado State University.
00035                 Isn&rsquo;t that cool?
00036         </p>
00037 </div>
00038 <p class="lighter">
00039         Google Earth is &copy; and / or &#8482; of Google Inc.
00040 </p>
00041
